edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.frontend
Class BackEndLSPDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPObject
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.frontend.BackEndLSPDescriptor
public class BackEndLSPDescriptor
extends LSPObject

Descibes one wrapped subcollection in a SDARTS server configuration. This descriptor is used by the FrontEndLSP to instantiate a BackEndLSP. It is basically an objectified form of the <back-end-lsp> tag inside of a sdarts_config.xml file. There is one descriptor for each of these tags present in the file, and they are all stored inside the SDARTSConfig object.

                            java.lang.String name,

Instantiates a descriptor. Typically, descriptors are instantiated by the SDARTSConfigBuilder as it assembles the SDARTSConfig.
Parameters:
classname - the fully-qualified classname of the BackEndLSP subclass to be instantiated
name - the name by which the back-end collection will be known
description - a description of the back-end collection
queryLanguages - the (computer) query lanagues the back-end subcollection understands
